description: This file defines the PaletteGenerator class responsible for generating visually distinct color palettes using HSL color space, including a fallback mechanism for ensuring palette size, and a Debouncer class to limit rapid successive requests.

classes.name: PaletteGenerator
classes.description: A class for generating color palettes with visual distinctness constraints, including fallback logic to ensure the desired number of colors.

classes.name: Debouncer
classes.description: A utility class to prevent rapid successive invocations within a specified time window.

methods.name: generateDistinctPalette
methods.description: Generates a list of visually distinct HSL colors, attempting to enforce minimum color distance, with a fallback to hue separation if needed.

methods.name: shouldProceed
methods.description: Determines whether enough time has passed since the last call to proceed with a new request, acting as a debounce.
